name: github-analytics-dashboard
description: Full-stack GitHub Analytics Dashboard with React frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:prod" "cd client && npm run preview"

author: GitHub Analytics Team
